## A few logical expressions

yo!

```{r}
5 == 1   #is 5 equal to 1?
"cat" == "dog"  #is cat equal to dog?

meds <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
meds == 3
meds == 1 | meds > 3  #is meds equal to one or greater than 3

batman <- 5
robin <- 7
ozzie <- 4

batman <= robin  # is batman greater than or equal to Robin?
```
